mapper.select: select * from sys_area where parent = #{code} order by code;
mapper.insert: insert into sys_smslog(id, mobile, message, status, category, creator, createTime) values(#{id}, #{mobile}, #{message}, #{status}, #{category}, #{creator}, #{createTime});
insert into sys_visitlog(id, ip, action, param, address, creator, createTime) values(#{id}, #{ip}, #{action}, #{param}, #{address}, #{creator}, #{createTime});

insert into sys_member(mobile, password, email, level, creator, createTime, modifier, modifyTime) values(#{mobile}, #{password}, #{email}, #{level}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifyTime});
mapper.update: update sys_member set password = #{password}, modifier = #{modifier}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where mobile = #{mobile};
mapper.select: select * from sys_member where mobile = #{mobile} and BINARY password = #{password} order by createTime limit 1;
select * from sys_invite where invite = #{invite} and enable = '1' and exist = '1';
mapper.update: update sys_invite set status = '1', modifier = #{modifier}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where invite = #{sysInviteCode};
mapper.select: select message from sys_smslog where mobile = #{mobile} and category = '01' order by createTime desc limit 1;

select addr.*, a1.name AS provinceName, a2.name AS cityName, a3.name AS countyName from sys_addr addr LEFT JOIN sys_area a1 ON addr.province = a1.code LEFT JOIN sys_area a2 ON addr.city = a2.code LEFT JOIN sys_area a3 ON addr.county = a3.code where enable = '1' and exist = '1' and memberID = #{id} order by isdefault desc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_addr (memberID, name, mobile, telephone, province, city, county, zipcode, address, isdefault, creator, createTime, modifier, modifyTime) values (#{memberID}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{telephone}, #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{isdefault}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifyTime});
mapper.update: update sys_addr set isdefault = '0', modifier = #{modifier}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where memberID = #{memberID};
mapper.select: select count(1) from sys_addr where enable = '1' and exist = '1' and memberID = #{memberID}
mapper.update: update sys_addr set exist = '0', modifier = #{modifier}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where id = #{id} and memberID = #{memberID};
update sys_addr set isdefault = '1', modifier = #{modifier}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where id = #{id} and memberID = #{memberID};
update sys_member set mobile = #{mobile}, modifier = #{modifier}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where id = #{id};
